Title: Prohibits the imposition of tax by a city or village on certain gas or electric transactions
Summary: Prohibits the imposition of tax by a city or village on certain gas or electric transactions that pass through the boundaries of a taxing jurisdiction but do not serve residential or commercial customers within such boundaries.
LawCode: Amd ยง20-b, Gen City L; amd ยง5-530, Vil L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general city law and the village law, in relation to prohibiting the imposition of tax by a city or village on certain gas or electric transactions that pass through the boundaries of a taxing jurisdiction but do not serve residential or commercial customers within such boundaries
